title: Humiliator
description: "D", a submissive man, replies to a personals ad offering discipline training, hoping for a "a selfish, greedy, demanding bastard" who will offer him deep humiliation. Brigadier Hugh Markman-Ryder gives "D" what he's looking for: but perhaps there's a good reason we don't always get what we want.WARNING: Contains extreme D/s activities, including piss and scat play. Absolutely no fluff included. 39 Chapters - M/m slash
author: Hugh Questorius
